DOC.brief_summary: The PROBI is a phase I/II trial assessing the feasibility of preoperative whole breast irradiation in female patients with low to intermediate risk breast cancer, who undergo breast conserving therapy, including a boost dose of irradiation. An additional goal of this study is to assess tumor response to radiotherapy, by imaging modalities (PET-CT and MRI) and pathology
